answers.answer: Drinking more water! Sounds crazy but drinking more water can help with swelling
Drink more water, lay on your left side, stay away from salt, and try not to stand for long periods of time
I'm the exact same way I try to take cool showers and stay off my feet plus I turned the air down to where is like 68 when I sleep and that's seemed to help some
I agree with the above. Make sure you tell your Dr and keep a close eye on how much you swell as too much swelling could be a sign of preeclampsia

question: I feel so swollen everywhere. But mostly my gums, feet and fingers. They feel like they are  going to split like a seam from the pressure! I've tried massage and soaking with hot water and epsom salts, any other ideas? It's keeping me awake tonight..
title: Swelling
